TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Toolset extends System.Object

span.span: Represent an aggregation of a tools version (eg.

summary.span: "2.0")、工具路徑和選擇性關聯屬性集的彙總。

span.span: "2.0"), tools path, and optional set of associated properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UNDONE: (danmose) 檢閱不變性。UNDONE: (danmose) Review immutability. 如果這不是不可變的加入一種機制，以通知擁有它遞增其 toolsetVersion 專案集合/秒。If this is not immutable, add a mechanism to notify the project collection/s owning it to increment their toolsetVersion.

summary.span: 使用指定的工具版本和工具路徑，建立工具組。

span.span: Creates a toolset with the given tools version and tools path.

summary.span: 會從指定的專案集合取得全域、保留和環境屬性。

span.span: Global, reserved, and environment properties are taken from the given project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultSubToolsetVersion { get; }
.property instance string DefaultSubToolsetVersion
Public ReadOnly Property DefaultSubToolsetVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultSubToolsetVersion { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.DefaultSubToolsetVersion : string

summary.span: 取得這個工具組的預設子工具組版本。

span.span: Gets the default sub toolset version for this toolset.

value.span: 傳回預設的子工具組版本。

span.span: Returns the default sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]是安裝，請使用基底工具組，並傳回"10.0"子 toolset 版本。If [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is installed, use the base toolset and return a sub toolset version of "10.0". 否則，請使用找到的最高版本的子工具組。Otherwise, use the highest-versioned sub toolset found. 子工具組，使用已編號的版本會加上數字; 排序前面的清單中找到的順序的開頭會加上任何額外的子工具組。Sub toolsets with numbered versions are ordered numerically; any additional sub toolsets are prepended to the beginning of the list in the order found. 如果不沒有可用的任何子工具組，則傳回 null 和[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]未安裝。Returns null if there is no sub toolset available and [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is not installed.

summary.span: 建立要用於這個 Toolset 的子 Toolset 版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion ();
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion() cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion () As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion();
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : unit -> string

summary.span: 建立要用於這個 Toolset 的子 Toolset 版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

returns.span: 傳回要用於此工具組的子工具組版本。

span.span: Returns the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果"VisualStudioVersion 」 上的工具組本身設定為屬性，子工具組版本設為"VisualStudioVersion 」。If "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否則，子工具組版本設為工具組 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> overrideGlobalProperties, int32 solutionVersion) cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion (overrideGlobalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String), solutionVersion As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string> * int -> string

param.name: overrideGlobalProperties
param.span: 一組全域屬性，用來建立子工具組版本。

span.span: Set of global properties to use to create the sub toolset version.

param.span: 可能是 Null。

span.span: May be null.

param.name: solutionVersion
param.span: 要用來建立子 Toolset 版本的方案版本。

span.span: The solution version to use to create the sub toolset version.

summary.span: 建立要用於這個 Toolset 的子 Toolset 版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.
Returns the sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳遞"VisualStudioVersion 「 全域屬性存在於一組全域屬性，子工具組版本設為"VisualStudioVersion 」。If the "VisualStudioVersion" global property exists in the set of global properties passed in, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否則，如果"VisualStudioVersion 」 上的工具組本身設定為屬性，則子 toolset 版本會設定為"VisualStudioVersion 」。Otherwise, if "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否則，如果對應至的方案版本的 Visual Studio 版本 (Visual Studio 版本 = 方案版本 – 1) 則子 toolset 版本會設為 Visual Studio 版本，在對應中傳遞至現有的子工具組。Otherwise, if the Visual Studio version corresponding to the solution version (Visual Studio version = solution version – 1) passed in maps to an existing sub toolset, then sub toolset version is set to the Visual Studio version. 否則，子工具組版本設為工具組 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

param.span: 子 Toolset 的子 Toolset 版本。

param.span: 可能是 Null。

span.span: May be null

summary.span: 取得指定的屬性名稱和子工具組版本所指定的屬性。

span.span: Gets property specified by the given property name and sub toolset version.

returns.span: 如果找到，則傳回屬性指定，否則傳回 null。

span.span: Returns the property specified, if it is found, otherwise returns null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子工具組中找不到屬性，搜尋的基底工具組中的屬性。If the property is not found in the sub toolset, searches for the property in the base toolset. 如果子工具組 」 或 「 基底工具組中找不到屬性，會傳回 null。If the property is not found in the sub toolset or the base toolset, returns null.
